title: [PR] Add beginner AI course: 27 modules covering Python fundamentals to Vision & Video AI with local LLMs
summary: Bootstraps the repo with a complete beginner-to-advanced AI development course structured as **27 focused modules**, each covering a single topic with a short video script (~5–8 min) and small, single-purpose Python code file(s). Targets developers who want to run LLMs locally (no cloud API keys).
